title: Offering Relief
details: The aim of the foundation is to offer relief and support for Astham sufferes who are unable to afford payment for the right treatment.

title: Provide Knowledge & Support
details: The aim of the foundation is to offer relief and support for Astham sufferes who are unable to afford payment for the right treatment.

title: Working Together
details: We will be working in partnership with Asthma UK and other Non-Governmental Organisations (NGO) in Nigeria that are doing the same work.

title: Non-Profit
details: The Foundation is a non-profit organisation dedicated to improve the lives of people with Asthma and Allergies. Every penny you can donate goes towards help suffering people.
